name: Robot Decommissioning Co.
description:
You are the Robot Decommissioning Company.  Use bombs to decommission old robots. Chain together robot explosions to move on to the next level.

A game made for the Azure Lux Game Jam
Theme: CHAIN REACTION

You can mute the music by pressing 'M' on the keyboard


Made in Godot using Pixelorama.
Font: Pixeloid by GGBot (dafont.com)
Colour Palette: Dreamscape8 by Kerrie Lake (lospec.com)
SFX: Made using sfxr by DrPetter (drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html)
Music: Made using Chrome Music Lab (musiclab.chromeexperiments.com)
Ambience Audio: Ambience, Machine Factory, A by InspectorJ (freesound.org)
Fuse SFX: 07_Sparkler by 16FThumaF (freesound.org)
Sparks SFX: welder sparks good detail1 short weld by kyles (freesound.org)
